languages.text: {n}Повисает неловкая пауза. Кибелла долго всматривается в лица офицеров, но затем утвердительно кивает.{/n} "Да будет так. Но не в таком виде. Ваши наряды, как и ваши лица, слишком приметны".

{n}There is an awkward pause. Kibellah takes a long look at the officers' faces, before finally nodding her assent.{/n} "So be it. But not like this. Much like your faces, your guises are too conspicuous."
languages.original_text: {n}Повисает неловкая пауза. Кибелла долго всматривается в лица офицеров, но затем утвердительно кивает.{/n} "Да будет так. Но не в таком виде. Ваши наряды, как и ваши лица, слишком приметны".

traits.locale_text: {n}There is an awkward pause. Kibellah takes a long look at the officers' faces, but then nods her affirmation.{/n} "So be it. But not like this. Much like your faces, your outfits are too conspicuous."

{n}There is an awkward pause. Kibellah takes a long look at the officers' faces, before finally nodding her assent.{/n} "So be it. But not like this. Much like your faces, your guises are too conspicuous."

languages.text: {n}Eine unangenehme Pause entsteht. Kibellah wirft einen langen prüfenden Blick in die Gesichter der Offiziere und nickt dann zustimmend.{/n} "So sei es. Aber nicht so. Wie Eure Gesichter ist auch Eure Erscheinung zu verdächtig."
languages.original_text: {n}There is an awkward pause. Kibellah takes a long look at the officers' faces, before finally nodding her assent.{/n} "So be it. But not like this. Much like your faces, your guises are too conspicuous."

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine unangenehme Pause entsteht. Kibellah wirft einen langen prüfenden Blick in die Gesichter der Offiziere und nickt dann zustimmend.{/n} "So sei es. Aber nicht so. Wie Eure Gesichter ist auch Erscheinung zu verdächtig."

languages.text: {n}Se produce un incómodo silencio. Kibellah observa detenidamente los rostros de los oficiales hasta que por fin asiente con la cabeza.{/n} «Que así sea. Pero esto no me gusta. Sus disfraces son tan poco convincentes como sus caras».
languages.original_text: {n}There is an awkward pause. Kibellah takes a long look at the officers' faces, before finally nodding her assent.{/n} "So be it. But not like this. Much like your faces, your guises are too conspicuous."

traits.locale_text: {n}Se produce un incómodo silencio. Kibellah observa detenidamente los rostros de los oficiales hasta que por fin asiente con la cabeza.{/n} «Que así sea. Pero esto no me gusta. Sus disfraces son tan poco convincentes como sus caras».

languages.text: {n}気まずい空気が流れる。キベラは士官たちの顔をじっくりと見た後、ようやく頷いて同意した。{/n}「そうしましょう。でも、このままではダメ。あなた達の顔と同じく、その装いも目立ちすぎなのよ」
languages.original_text: {n}There is an awkward pause. Kibellah takes a long look at the officers' faces, before finally nodding her assent.{/n} "So be it. But not like this. Much like your faces, your guises are too conspicuous."

traits.locale_text: {n}気まずい空気が流れる。キベラは士官たちの顔をじっくりと見た後、ようやく頷いて同意した。{/n}「そうしましょう。でも、このままではダメ。あなた達の顔と同じく、その装いも目立ちすぎなのよ」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈盯着两位军官的脸，一言不发。漫长而尴尬的停顿过后，她终于点了点头。{/n}“那就这么定吧，但像这样可不行。你们的装束实在是太显眼了，就像你们的脸一样显眼。”
languages.original_text: {n}There is an awkward pause. Kibellah takes a long look at the officers' faces, before finally nodding her assent.{/n} "So be it. But not like this. Much like your faces, your guises are too conspicuous."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈盯着两位军官的脸，一言不发。漫长而尴尬的停顿过后，她终于点了点头。{/n}“那就这么定吧，但像这样可不行。你们的装束实在是太显眼了，就像你们的脸一样显眼。”

languages.text: {n}Un silence gênant s'installe. Kibellah scrute longuement le visage des officiers avant de donner son consentement d'un hochement de tête.{/n} « Soit. Mais pas ainsi. Tout comme vos visages, vos tenues sont trop reconnaissables. »
languages.original_text: {n}There is an awkward pause. Kibellah takes a long look at the officers' faces, before finally nodding her assent.{/n} "So be it. But not like this. Much like your faces, your guises are too conspicuous."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un silence gênant s'installe. Kibellah scrute longuement le visage des officiers avant de donner son consentement d'un hochement de tête.{/n} « Soit. Mais pas ainsi. Tout comme vos visages, vos tenues sont trop reconnaissables. »

languages.text: {n}Tuhaf bir duraksama yaşanıyor. Kibellah, subayların yüzlerine uzunca bir süre bakıyor. En nihayetinde onayladığını belirterek başını eğiyor.{/n} "Öyle olsun madem. Ancak bu hoşuma gitmiyor. Tıpkı yüzleriniz gibi kılıklarınız da çok göze batıyor."
languages.original_text: {n}There is an awkward pause. Kibellah takes a long look at the officers' faces, before finally nodding her assent.{/n} "So be it. But not like this. Much like your faces, your guises are too conspicuous."
